item.title: PATH
item.description: score:103 Chances: Market catalysts and internal growth make it likely that these stocks will continue to rally in 2024. Each of these businesses experienced substantial year-over-year revenue growth. UiPath is Ark Invest’s second-largest holding. Thanks to artificial intelligence (AI), automation stocks will be in demand by investors throughout this year and into next.
